content: sale at two girls patterns 3 patterns for $14 00 4 patterns for $17 00 who doesn t need a lip balm holder i know that i did so that is why i made up this one very handy with it s loop strap which makes it easily attach to your key chain or any bag o this is a great project to use up a small amount of fingering weight yarn that you have in your stash or even some of that embroidery floss you may have laying around we couldn t bring ourselves to have our testers test a free pattern so if you do run across any mistakes please feel free to let us know o
